compset.NAME: I_2000
compset.DESC: CLM with QIAN atm input data for 1972-2004 and Satellite phenology (SP), CO2 level and Aerosol deposition for 2000

compset.NAME: I_2000_CN_f19_alaskaUSA
compset.DESC: CLM with QIAN atm input data for 1972-2004 and Carbon Nitrogen (CN), CO2 level and Aerosol deposition for 2000 for CLM_USRDAT_NAME at f19 resolution over Alaska

compset.NAME: I_2000_1PTFRC_US-UMB
compset.DESC: CLM with CLM1PT atm input data for 1999-2006, CO2 level and Aerosol deposition for 2000 for CLM_USRDAT_NAME for 1x1_US-UMB

compset.NAME: I_2000_VOC
compset.DESC: CLM with QIAN atm input data for 1972-2004 and Satellite phenology (SP), CO2 level and Aerosol deposition for 2000, VOC

compset.NAME: I_2000_VOC_CN
compset.DESC: CLM with QIAN atm input data for 1972-2004 and Carbon Nitrogen (CN), CO2 level and Aerosol deposition for 2000, VOC on

compset.NAME: I_2000_VOC_SNCRFRC_CN
compset.DESC: CLM with QIAN atm input data for 1972-2004 and Carbon Nitrogen (CN), CO2 level and Aerosol deposition for 2000, VOC and SNICAR-FRC on

compset.NAME: I_2000_VOC_SNCRFRC_CN_GLCMECPD
compset.DESC: CLM with QIAN atm input data for 1972-2004 and Carbon Nitrogen (CN), CO2 level and Aerosol deposition for 2000, VOC Glc-MEC and SNICAR-FRC on

compset.NAME: I_1850-2000_VOC_SNCRFRC_CN
compset.DESC: CLM with QIAN atm input data for 1850-2000 transient aerosol deposition and land-use change and Carbon Nitrogen (CN), VOC and SNICAR-FRC on

compset.NAME: I_2000_GLCMECPD
compset.DESC: CLM with QIAN atm input data for 1972-2004 and Satellite phenology (SP), CO2 level and Aerosol deposition for 2000, Glacier Multi-Elev. classes on

compset.NAME: I_2000_CN_CROP
compset.DESC: CLM with QIAN atm input data for 1972-2004 and CN (Carbon Nitrogen) with prognostic Crop model, CO2 level and Aerosol deposition for 2000

compset.NAME: I_2000_CNDV_CROP
compset.DESC: CLM with QIAN atm input data for 1972-2004 and CNDV (Carbon Nitrogen Dynamic Vegetation) with prognostic Crop model, CO2 level and Aerosol deposition for 2000

compset.NAME: I_2000_CNDV
compset.DESC: CLM with QIAN atm input data for 1972-2004 and CNDV (Carbon Nitrogen Dynamic Vegetation), CO2 level and Aerosol deposition for 2000

compset.NAME: I_2000_CN_rtmR01
compset.DESC: CLM with QIAN atm input data for 1972-2004 and CN (Carbon Nitrogen) for 2000 using a R01 RTM grid

compset.NAME: I_2000_CN_rtmOff
compset.DESC: CLM with QIAN atm input data for 1972-2004 and CN (Carbon Nitrogen) for 2000 with all RTM options off

compset.NAME: I_2000_CN_rtmOn
compset.DESC: CLM with QIAN atm input data for 1972-2004 and CN (Carbon Nitrogen) for 2000 with some different RTM options

compset.NAME: I_1850_CN_ADSPIN
compset.DESC: CLM with QIAN atm input data for 1948-1972 and CN (Carbon Nitrogen) in AD spinup mode, CO2 level and Aerosol deposition for 1850

compset.NAME: I_1850_CN_EXSPIN
compset.DESC: CLM with QIAN atm input data for 1948-1972 and CN (Carbon Nitrogen) in exit spinup mode, CO2 level and Aerosol deposition for 1850

compset.NAME: I_2000_1PTFRC
compset.DESC: CLM with single point tower site atm input data and Satellite phenology (SP), CO2 level and Aerosol deposition for 2000

compset.NAME: I_2000_CN
compset.DESC: CLM with QIAN atm input data for 1972-2004 and CN (Carbon Nitrogen) biogeochemistry, CO2 level and Aerosol deposition for 2000

compset.NAME: I_1850_SPINUP_3HrWx_CN
compset.DESC: CLM with BCN CPLHIST 3-hourly weather forcing data and half-hourly solar for 1850 spinup of CN (Carbon Nitrogen) biogeochemistry, CO2 level and Aerosol deposition for 1850
